eventSummary:
Kaspersky researchers discovered 'Stealka' malware distributed as fake game mods on GitHub and SourceForge, targeting crypto wallets and browser credentials across 115 extensions.
Sources:
- https://cryptonews.com/news/gamers-at-risk-as-fake-roblox-mods-spread-crypto-stealing-malware

eventSummary:

eventSummary:
Baker University disclosed a data breach affecting over 53,000 individuals, involving the theft of personal, health, and financial information after attackers accessed its network a year ago.
Sources:

eventSummary:
The U.S. Justice Department seized infrastructure used in a large-scale fraud operation that utilized fake search engine ads to harvest bank login credentials, resulting in at least $14.6 million in losses.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/209811713/status/2003379340105724184
